IMP! Theme,
based on Typebase CSS

With custom hero block

This theme is based on Typebase CSS with some custom CSS and HTML (see in edit mode) . SImple, clean, readable. This style gives good sizes and whitespace proportions.

To use this theme:

  1. Download css (right click on link, choose "save as")
  2. Open this page in edit mode
  3. Scroll down, click "Duplicate page" button
  4. Enter filename, save with downloaded css.
